verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> saying,<WH559>
"This month<WH2320> shall be to you the beginning<WH7218> of months.<WH2320> It shall be the first<WH7223> month<WH2320> of the year to you.<WH8141>

Speak<WH1696> to all the congregation<WH5712> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> <WH6218> 'On the tenth day of this month,<WH2320> they shall take<WH3947> to them every man<WH376> a lamb,<WH7716> according to their fathers<WH1>' houses,<WH1004> a lamb<WH7716> for a household;<WH1004>

and if the household<WH1004> is<WH1961> too little<WH4591> for a lamb,<WH7716> then he and his neighbor<WH7934> next<WH7138> to his house<WH1004> shall take<WH3947> one according to the number<WH4373> of the souls;<WH5315> according<WH6310> to what everyone<WH376> can eat<WH400> you shall make your count<WH3699> for the lamb.<WH7716>
Your lamb<WH7716> shall be without blemish,<WH8549> a male<WH2145> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old.<WH3947> You shall take it from the sheep,<WH3532> or from the goats:<WH5795>

and you shall keep<WH4931> it until the fourteenth<WH702> day<WH3117> of the same month;<WH2320> and the whole<WH3605> assembly<WH6951> of the congregation<WH5712> of Israel<WH3478> shall kill<WH7819> it at<WH996> evening.<WH6153>
They shall take<WH3947> some of the blood,<WH1818> and put<WH5414> it on the two<WH8147> doorposts<WH4201> and on the lintel,<WH4947> on the houses<WH1004> in which they shall eat it.<WH398>
They shall eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> in that night,<WH3915> roasted<WH6748> with fire,<WH784> and unleavened bread.<WH4682> They shall eat<WH398> it with bitter herbs.<WH4844>
Don't<WH398> eat it raw,<WH4995> nor boiled<WH1310> at all with water,<WH4325> but roasted<WH6748> with fire;<WH784> with its head,<WH7218> its legs<WH3767> and its inner parts.<WH7130>
You shall let nothing of it remain<WH3498> until the morning;<WH1242> but that which remains<WH3498> of it until the morning<WH1242> you shall burn<WH8313> with fire.<WH784>

This<WH3602> is how you shall eat<WH398> it:<WH2296> with your belt on your waist,<WH4975> your shoes<WH5275> on your feet,<WH7272> and your staff<WH4731> in your hand;<WH3027> and you shall eat<WH398> it in haste:<WH2649> it is Yahweh<WH3068>'s Passover.<WH6453>

For I will go<WH5674> through the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> in that night,<WH3915> and will strike<WH5221> all the firstborn<WH1060> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> both man<WH120> and animal.<WH929> Against all the gods<WH430> of Egypt<WH4714> I will execute<WH6213> judgments:<WH8201> I am Yahweh.<WH3068>

The blood<WH1818> shall be to you for a token<WH226> on the houses<WH1004> where you are:<WH7200> and when I see the blood,<WH1818> I will pass<WH6452> over you,<WH5063> and there shall no plague be on you to destroy<WH4889> you,<WH5221> when I strike the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

This day<WH3117> shall be to you for a memorial,<WH2146> and you shall keep<WH2287> it a feast<WH2282> to Yahweh:<WH3068> throughout your generations<WH1755> you shall keep it a feast<WH2287> by an ordinance<WH2708> forever.<WH5769>

<WH7651>"'Seven days<WH3117> you shall eat<WH398> unleavened bread;<WH4682> even<WH389> the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> you shall put away<WH7673> yeast<WH7603> out of your houses,<WH1004> for whoever eats<WH398> leavened bread<WH2557> from the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> until the seventh<WH7637> day,<WH3117> that soul<WH5315> shall be cut<WH3772> off from Israel.<WH3478>

In the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> there shall be to you a holy<WH6944> convocation,<WH4744> and in the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> a holy<WH6944> convocation;<WH4744> no kind of work<WH4399> shall be done<WH6213> in them,<WH389> except that which every man<WH5315> must eat,<WH398> that only may be done by you.<WH6213>

You shall observe<WH8104> the feast of unleavened bread;<WH4682> for in this same<WH6106> day<WH3117> have I brought<WH3318> your armies<WH6635> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt:<WH4714> therefore you shall observe<WH8104> this day<WH3117> throughout your generations<WH1755> by an ordinance<WH2708> forever.<WH5769>

In the first<WH7223> month,<WH6240> on the fourteenth day<WH3117> of the month<WH2320> at evening,<WH6153> you shall eat<WH398> unleavened bread,<WH4682> until the twenty<WH6242> first<WH259> day<WH3117> of the month<WH2320> at evening.<WH6153>

There shall be no yeast<WH7603> found<WH4672> in your houses<WH1004> for seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> for whoever eats<WH398> that which is leavened,<WH2556> that soul<WH5315> shall be cut off<WH3772> from the congregation<WH5712> of Israel,<WH3478> whether he be a foreigner,<WH1616> or one who is born<WH249> in the land.<WH776>
You shall eat<WH398> nothing leavened.<WH2556> In all your habitations<WH4186> you shall eat<WH398> unleavened bread.<WH4682>'"

Then Moses<WH4872> called<WH7121> for all the elders<WH2205> of Israel,<WH3478> and said<WH559> to them,<WH4900> "Draw out, and take<WH3947> lambs<WH6629> according to your families,<WH4940> and kill<WH7819> the Passover.<WH6453>

You shall take<WH3947> a bunch<WH92> of hyssop,<WH231> and dip<WH2881> it in the blood<WH1818> that is in the basin,<WH5592> and strike<WH5060> the lintel<WH4947> and the two<WH8147> doorposts<WH4201> with the blood<WH1818> that is in the basin;<WH5592> and none<WH376> of you shall go out<WH3318> of the door<WH6607> of his house<WH1004> until the morning.<WH1242>

For Yahweh<WH3068> will pass through<WH5674> to strike<WH5062> the Egyptians;<WH4714> and when he sees<WH7200> the blood<WH1818> on the lintel,<WH4947> and on the two<WH8147> doorposts,<WH4201> Yahweh<WH3068> will pass over<WH6452> the door,<WH6607> and will not allow<WH5414> the destroyer<WH7843> to come<WH935> in to your houses<WH1004> to strike you.<WH5062>
You shall observe<WH8104> this thing<WH1697> for an ordinance<WH2706> to you and to your sons<WH1121> forever.<WH5769>
It shall happen when you have come<WH935> to the land<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> will give<WH5414> you,<WH1696> according as he has promised, that you shall keep<WH8104> this service.<WH5656>
It will happen,<WH1121> when your children ask<WH559> you,<WH5656> 'What do you mean by this service?'

that you shall say,<WH559> <WH2077> 'It is the sacrifice of Yahweh<WH3068>'s Passover,<WH6453> who passed<WH6452> over the houses<WH1004> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> in Egypt,<WH4714> when he struck<WH5062> the Egyptians,<WH4714> and spared<WH5337> our houses.<WH1004>'" The people<WH5971> bowed their heads<WH6915> and worshiped.<WH7812>
The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went<WH3212> and did<WH6213> so;<WH3068> as Yahweh had commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> so they did.<WH6213>

It happened at midnight,<WH2677> that Yahweh<WH3068> struck<WH5221> all the firstborn<WH1060> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> from the firstborn<WH1060> of Pharaoh<WH6547> who sat<WH3427> on his throne<WH3678> to the firstborn<WH1060> of the captive<WH7628> who was in the dungeon;<WH1004> and all the firstborn<WH1060> of livestock.<WH929>

Pharaoh<WH6547> rose up<WH6965> in the night,<WH3915> he,<WH5650> and all his servants, and all the Egyptians;<WH4714> and there was a great<WH1419> cry<WH6818> in Egypt,<WH4714> for there was not a house<WH1004> where there was not one dead.<WH4191>

He called<WH7121> for Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> by night,<WH3915> and said,<WH559> "Rise up,<WH6965> get out<WH3318> from among<WH8432> my people,<WH5971> both you and the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> and go,<WH3212> serve<WH5647> Yahweh,<WH3068> as you have said!<WH1696>
Take<WH3947> both your flocks<WH6629> and your herds,<WH1241> as you have said,<WH1696> and be gone;<WH3212> and bless me also!<WH1288>"
The Egyptians<WH4714> were urgent<WH2388> with the people,<WH5971> to send<WH7971> them out of the land<WH776> in haste,<WH4116> for they said,<WH559> "We are all dead men.<WH4191>"
The people<WH5971> took<WH5375> their dough<WH1217> before it was leavened,<WH2556> their kneading troughs<WH4863> being bound up<WH6887> in their clothes<WH8071> on their shoulders.<WH7926>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> according to the word<WH1697> of Moses;<WH4872> and they asked<WH7592> of the Egyptians<WH4714> jewels<WH3627> of silver,<WH3701> and jewels<WH3627> of gold,<WH2091> and clothing.<WH8071>

Yahweh<WH3068> gave<WH5414> the people<WH5971> favor<WH2580> in the sight<WH5869> of the Egyptians,<WH4714> so that they let them have<WH7592> what they asked.<WH5337> They despoiled the Egyptians.<WH4714>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> traveled<WH5265> from Rameses<WH7486> to Succoth,<WH5523> about six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> on foot<WH7273> who were men,<WH1397> besides<WH905> children.<WH2945>
A mixed<WH6154> multitude<WH7227> went up<WH5927> also with them,<WH6629> with flocks, herds,<WH1241> and even very<WH3966> much<WH3515> livestock.<WH4735>

They baked<WH644> unleavened<WH4682> cakes<WH5692> of the dough<WH1217> which they brought out<WH3318> of Egypt;<WH4714> for it wasn't<WH2556> leavened, because they were thrust out<WH1644> of Egypt,<WH4714> and couldn't<WH3201> wait,<WH4102> neither had they prepared<WH6213> for themselves any food.<WH6720>
Now the time<WH4186> that the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> lived<WH3427> in Egypt<WH4714> was four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> thirty<WH7970> years.<WH8141>

It happened at the end<WH7093> of four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> thirty<WH7970> years,<WH8141> even the same<WH6106> day<WH3117> it happened,<WH6635> that all the armies of Yahweh<WH3068> went out<WH3318> from the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

It is a night<WH3915> to be much observed<WH8107> to Yahweh<WH3068> for bringing<WH3318> them out from the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714> This is that night<WH3915> of Yahweh,<WH3068> to be much observed<WH8107> of all the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> throughout their generations.<WH1755>
Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> "This is the ordinance<WH2708> of the Passover.<WH6453> No foreigner<WH1121> shall eat of it,<WH398>
but every man<WH376>'s servant<WH5650> who is bought<WH4736> for money,<WH3701> when you have circumcised<WH4135> him,<WH398> then shall he eat of it.
A foreigner<WH8453> and a hired servant<WH7916> shall not eat of it.<WH398>

In one<WH259> house<WH1004> shall it be eaten;<WH398> you shall not carry out<WH3318> anything of the flesh<WH1320> abroad<WH2351> out of the house;<WH1004> neither shall you break<WH7665> a bone of it.<WH6106>
All the congregation<WH5712> of Israel<WH3478> shall keep it.<WH6213>

When a stranger<WH1616> shall live as a foreigner<WH1616> with you,<WH6213> and will keep the Passover<WH6453> to Yahweh,<WH3068> let all his males<WH2145> be circumcised,<WH4135> and then let him come near<WH7126> and keep<WH6213> it;<WH249> and he shall be as one who is born in the land:<WH776> but no uncircumcised person<WH6189> shall eat of it.<WH398>
One<WH259> law<WH8451> shall be to him who is born<WH249> at home,<WH1616> and to the stranger who lives as a foreigner<WH1481> among you.<WH8432>"
All the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> so.<WH3068> As Yahweh commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> so they did.<WH6213>
It happened the same<WH6106> day,<WH3117> that Yahweh<WH3068> brought<WH3318> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> by their armies.<WH6635>
